name: Godot Engine Exported Scene File
summary: Learn about .ESCN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ESCN files are the same as SCN files but are used to store scene information exported from another program, such as Blender. Also, ESCN files should not be edited in Godot Engine.

description: An ESCN file contains a scene used by Godot Engine, a free and open source game engine used to create 2D and 3D games. It stores information that details a single scene tree inside Godot Engine, which may include paths to external resources, internal resources, connections, and nodes.
